action.action-desc: Mr. Biggs of Arizona introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources

form.official-title: To amend the Endangered Species Act of 1973 to prevent a species that is not native to the United States from being listed as an endangered species or a threatened species, to prohibit certain types of financial assistance, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the American Sovereignty and Species Protection Act of 2025.

section.header: Limitation on listing of nonnative species and provision of certain financial assistance

subsection.header: Limitation on listing of nonnative species
subsection.text: Section 4(a) of the Endangered Species Act of 1973 (16 U.S.C. 1533(a)) is amended by adding at the end the following:

paragraph.text: The Secretary may not determine that a species is an endangered species or a threatened species pursuant to this section if such species is not native to the United States.

subsection.header: Limitation on provision of certain financial assistance
subsection.text: Section 8(a) of the Endangered Species Act of 1973 (16 U.S.C. 1537(a)) is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: by striking As a demonstration of and inserting the following:
by striking (which includes, but is not limited to, the acquisition, by lease or otherwise, of lands, waters, or interests therein); and
by adding at the end the following:

paragraph.header: Prohibition on purchasing land in a foreign country
paragraph.text: No financial assistance provided under paragraph (1) may be used to acquire, by lease or otherwise, lands, waters, or other interests in a foreign country.
